attributes.action: Investigate the chaos that surrounds Student Finance England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Student Finance England is a cumbersome, over complicated, bureaucratic system. Money could be saved by linking directly with HMRC.
Both students and parents experience needless difficulties which make the application process stressful.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Investigate the chaos that surrounds Student Finance England."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20857


Prime Minister's Office
